name: semgrep
description: Security scans in a snap. Speedy SAST with a powerful rule registry for seamless detection and remediation of code vulnerabilities with each save.

commands.title: Semgrep: Scan changed files in workspace
Semgrep: Scan all files in workspace

semgrep.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

semgrep.trace.lspjsBreakBeforeStart.description: Break before starting the LSP server in the Javascript version of the extension. Warning, this is for debugging purposes and may break things.

semgrep.path.description: Path to the Semgrep executable. If none is set the extension will use the prepackaged version of Semgrep. Note: this has no effect if semgrep.useJS is set

semgrep.useJS.description: Use the pure Javascript version of the extension. Warning, this is experimental and may break or have performance issues

semgrep.stackSizeJS.description: Maximum stack size (in KB) for the Javascript version of the extension. Warning, this is experimental and may break or have performance issues

semgrep.heapSizeJS.description: Maximum heap size (in MB) for the Javascript version of the extension. Increase if the extension crashes while downloading rules. Warning, this is experimental and may break or have performance issues.

semgrep.ignoreCliVersion.description: Ignore CLI Version, and enable all extension features (Warning: this is mainly for extension development, and can break things if enabled!)

semgrep.scan.configuration.description: Each item can be a YAML configuration file, directory of YAML files ending in .yml | .yaml, URL of a configuration file, or Semgrep registry entry name. Use "auto" to automatically obtain rules tailored to this project; your project URL will be used to log in to the Semgrep registry.

semgrep.scan.exclude.description: List of files or directories to exclude.

semgrep.scan.include.description: List of files or directories to include.

semgrep.scan.jobs.description: Number of parallel jobs to run.

semgrep.scan.maxMemory.description: Maximum memory to use in megabytes.

semgrep.scan.maxTargetBytes.description: Maximum size of target in bytes to scan.

semgrep.scan.timeout.description: Maximum time to scan in seconds.

semgrep.scan.timeoutThreshold.description: Maximum number of rules that can timeout on a file before the file is skipped. If set to 0 will not have limit. Defaults to 3.

semgrep.scan.onlyGitDirty.description: Only scan lines changed since the last commit

semgrep.scan.pro_intrafile.description: Enable intrafile scanning using the Semgrep Pro Engine (requires Pro Engine to be already installed)

semgrep.doHover.description: Enable hovering for AST node viewing (requires restart)
